snippet.title: FU’UN SUPER COMBO - Gameplay Trailer [US]
snippet.description:
FU’UN SUPER COMBO for PlayStation®4 launches on the PlayStation Store as part of the “PS2 Games” initiative!

FU’UN SUPER COMBO marks the start of a new series of import releases from SNK for the PlayStation®4! This
release includes both SAVAGE REIGN (Japanese title: 風雲黙示録) which came out in 1995 and its sequel, KIZUNA
ENCOUNTER (Japanese title: 風雲SUPER TAG BATTLE) which was released in November 1996. Take control of a
unique cast of characters in these two fighting games including the boss characters, Shin Shishioh from SAVAGE REIGN
and Jyazu from KIZUNA ENCOUNTER, who are both playable in the versus mode. This version also features a practice
mode, a skill list, and the ability for players to create their own customized color in a color edit mode. The game also
includes an arranged OST and features “Trophies” functionality for this PlayStation®4 release. Stay tuned for more future
announcements as part of this “PS2™ Games” initiative! Although this game is a Japanese import release, it is possible to
change the in-game text language from the options menu inside both games. SAVAGE REIGN supports English and
Spanish while KIZUNA ENCOUNTER supports English, Spanish and Portuguese.

©SNK CORPORATION ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
